1. CS placements will always be better than ECE placements. 

2. Do not choose ECE if you aren't interested in it.

Hey why do you prefer PES cs over BMS cs?

Assuming both are through CET, PES has slightly better placements, a much better crowd and a stronger academic focus. If you're focused on building the foundation of your career and not a party person, then PES is the right choice here. Ofc it comes with an average college life, but as I said, if you only care about the RoI and career opportunities, then PES is the way to go.
